mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Pipes, James
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Taylor Co., West Virginia [Taylor County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Pipes, James Patient Age: 24. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound left side fracture of tenth rib. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Recovered and returned to duty. Furloughed 1864/08/17.
